title: Hollyoaks star Nadine Mulkerrin took hours to leave house with baby
text:
She welcomed her first child with fiancé Rory Douglas-Speed last week.

And Nadine Mulkerrin revealed that it took her more than two hours to leave the house for her first family outing on Thursday after giving birth to son Reggie.

The Hollyoaks Cleo McQueen star, 26, took to Instagram to document her trip, where she 'hobbled like a 90-year-old', to Lark Lane in Liverpool where the trio visited a cafe.

First day out: Nadine Mulkerrin revealed that it took her more than two hours to leave the house for her first family outing on Thursday after giving birth to son Reggie

Sharing a photo of herself and Rory in the street with Reggie in his pram, the new parents proudly beamed to the camera.

Nadine captioned the snap with: 'It took like two hours but we're out!!!'

While she penned alongside a different photo of the family-of-three, sitting in a cafe, with: 'That’s us three on Lark Lane [heart emoji] (It took over 2 hours & I hobbled along like a 90 year old but we made it!!!)'

The first time mum looked stylish as she opted for a comfy ensemble of black leggings, a white vest top, a tailored camel coat and UGG boots.

Sweet: The Hollyoaks Cleo McQueen star, 26, took to Instagram to document her trip, where she 'hobbled like a 90-year-old', to Lark Lane in Liverpool where the trio visited a cafe

Cosy: After their outing in the morning, the family decided to enjoy a bed day together with Nadine sharing a picture of the trio snuggled up

Nadine looked radiant as she styled her brunette locks with a leopard print headband adding just a slick of make-up.

While Rory opted for black shorts with Nike sports top and a padded jacket, he teamed his look with blue trainers.

After their outing in the morning, the family decided to enjoy a bed day together with Nadine sharing a picture of their new parent mugs, one said mummy's mug and the other daddy's mug.

It comes after Rory proved he was settling into fatherhood as he shared a sweet snap of newborn son Reggie and Nadine sleeping on Instagram on Wednesday.

New parents: She also shared a picture of their new parent mugs, one said mummy's mug and the other daddy's mug

New mum: Nadine looked radiant as she breastfed Reggie in another sweet snap taken by Rory

In the photo the Joel Dexter actor, 27, can be seen cradling his adorable sleeping son while Nadine, 26, gets some much-needed sleep beside him in bed.

The devoted dad stared lovingly across at his partner as the family enjoyed some relaxed time in between feeds.

He wrote in the caption: 'Here's a picture of me for once actually awake in the middle of the night while Nadine finally gets some sleep.. would love to say this is a common occurrence.'

Earlier this week the hunk shared a beautiful photo of Reggie sleeping on his chest, writing: 'Never had such big bags under my eyes, but it’s all worth it! #prouddadspam.'

Family: Hollyoaks star Rory Douglas-Speed proved he was settling into fatherhood as he shared a sweet snap of newborn son Reggie and Nadine Mulkerrin sleeping on Instagram on Wednesday

The photos comes after Nadine shared a candid post about her postpartum experience on Tuesday, admitting things have been 'tough' on her body but it's 'all worth it' to have her baby boy in her arms.

The actress bravely shared two nude pictures as well as an underwear clad snap, displaying her post-baby body in a bid to break the taboo surrounding birth.

Nadine, who plays Cleo McQueen on the soap, wrote: '1 Week Postpartum! Was thinking should I really post a pic of my bare a** on insta ...

'Then I thought b****r it!! The recovery is tough, the tears have lifted, my t**s are big brown aggressive and slightly Pamela Anderson-esque but you can’t do anything fun with them!

Cute: Earlier this week the hunk shared a beautiful photo of Reggie sleeping on his chest, writing: 'Never had such big bags under my eyes, but it’s all worth it! #prouddadspam'

'Between getting your partner to inject you and put suppositories in mysterious places it’s been a barrel of laughs!

'It’s the best rollercoaster I’ve ever been on I don’t wanna get off! All mummies your amazing!! It’s true it’s all worth it.'

Nadine announced baby Reggie had been born with a snap of her family in the delivery room last week.

She wrote in the caption: 'Reggie Speed You're the coolest little dude we never knew we were missing in our lives! We love you so Much.

Speaking out: The photos comes after Nadine shared a candid post about her postpartum experience on Tuesday, admitting things have been 'tough' on her body but it's 'all worth it' to have her baby boy in her arms

Before and after: The actress bravely shared two nude pictures, displaying her post-baby body in a bid to break the taboo surrounding birth (pictured left, before, and right, after)

Honest post: Nadine was candid about the physical difficulties she had endured since giving birth, but added, 'It’s the best rollercoaster I’ve ever been on I don’t wanna get off!'

'Also Thank you to every incredible NHS worker we've come across at the womens. (Helen,Jordine,Amy,Amy) Your all walking angels. Thank you so much for making one of biggest moments of our lives so extra special with care.'

In the snap, a besotted Nadine lay in a hospital bed as she cradled her baby boy for the first time, with a proud Rory looking on.

Sharing the same snap a minute later, Rory, who plays Joel Dexter, wrote: 'Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19

'We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn't think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour, Women are seriously Superhuman x.'

Happiest day: Nadine and Rory announced their new arrival on Instagram last week

New mother: As well as announcing the baby's name, Nadine thanked the NHS for their help

Proud dad: Rory said his heart was 'bursting' as he celebrated the arrival of the couple's son

Nadine confirmed her pregnancy when she was nearly five months along back in June, shortly before the British Soap Awards.

The pair, who have been an item since 2017, announced their exciting news via Instagram.

They shared a snap and captioned it: 'That's us three ready for the @thebritishsoapawards'.

The post was also shared on Hollyoaks' official Instagram account, captioning it: 'BEST. NEWS. EVER.'
description: The Hollyoaks Cleo McQueen star, 26, took to Instagram to document her trip, where she 'hobbled like a 90-year-old', to Lark Lane in Liverpool where the trio visited a cafe.
